TopicTitle: Needing help on a space plane launcher!

Articles.Content: I\'m new at this, but i cant find a rocket design that works to launch my new SR-107 Space plane into orbit. I\'m reluctant to change the actual shape of the plane. any ideas? Heres a screenshot, and if the craft file is needed, just let me know.

Try columns of FL-500 tanks, 2 stacks above plane, 2 below.

Attach them with radial decouplers.

Then use tri-couplers to put 3 LV-T45s under each.

Rotate tri-couplers as needed to fit the engine cluster together.

Make a sacrificial offering to Space Kraken.

Launch.

Tweak to fix imbalance issues.

Repeat tweaking imbalances until it works or you give up.
